name: The Design Onboarding
description:
Not the onboarding you might think


This is a talk from 2021 I gave about designing an onboarding process for designers.


We want new designers to feel welcome, quickly understand the context of our users, our business and how Design operates within. By using the Walnut Model and focusing on the How (Context) first, instead of jumping into the what (Content) right away â€“ we make sure that our newly joined designers very quickly have all the information and tools at their disposal to succeed.


The design onboarding is spread over a course of two weeks with 4 sessions in the first week and 1 session within the second week.
